page.title: 15 Trees in our area
page.content: Each pupil recorded the trees in four gardens. We found that 42% of all trees were deciduous and 58% evergreen. Most people prefer to grow evergreen trees in their garden.Most people when asked said this was because they did not lose their leaves and so look nice all year round providing a nice hedge for their privacy. Away from gardens in the natural wild area where we live 91% of trees were deciduous. The most common deciduous trees were beech,ash,oak and willow. Only 2% of all trees found were saplings most of these having being planted by man.What a shame!
